course_title: Corporate Compliance:Oversight,Culture, & Mgmt. of Foreign Corrupt Practices Act & Other Legal Risks
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 48 / Seats Avail: 26Waitlist Total: 0 of 2
course_description: This course will offer an overview of the history and standards driving such programs, and, most importantly, will present practical content and best practices on how compliance programs work. The course also will focus on the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act, the world's preeminent anti-corruption law, the enforcement of which has figured prominently in the development of corporate compliance programs.
sections: Class Nbr: 1156, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-8p, Instructor: Snyderman/Rogers, Status: Open
